card.name: Hangman
card.text: As Hangman enters the battlefield, secretly note a word with six to eight letters. {1}: Target player who doesn't control Hangman guesses the noted word or an unguessed letter in that word. If he or she guesses wrong, put a +1/+1 counter on Hangman. Any player may activate this ability. When a player guesses the noted word or all of its letters, sacrifice Hangman.

card.name: Bee-Bee Gun
card.text: When you crank Bee-Bee Gun, until end of turn, target creature gains "{2}: This creature fights another target creature."

card.name: Steamflogger of the Month
card.text: When Steamflogger of the Month enters the battlefield, it assembles a Contraption for each Contraption you control. (To assemble a Contraption, put the top card of your Contraption deck onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Genetic Recombinator
card.text: Whenever you crank Genetic Recombinator, up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Finders, Keepers
card.text: Destroy target creature, then assemble a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Aerial Toastmaster
card.text: Flying {3}{W}, Sacrifice another artifact: Aerial Toastmaster assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Dogsnail Engine
card.text: Whenever you crank Dogsnail Engine, target player gains life equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.

card.name: Steamflogger Boss
card.text:
Other Riggers you control get +1/+0 and have haste.
If a Rigger you control would assemble a Contraption, it assembles two Contraptions instead.
